statements: SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, activity, light_intensity FROM user_behavior_data WHERE user_id = '12345'
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT user_id, light_intensity, temperature FROM user_behavior_data ORDER BY light_intensity DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_behavior_data
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data WHERE activity = 'Running' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, activity, temperature FROM user_behavior_data WHERE light_intensity > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, light_intensity FROM user_behavior_data WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY light_intensity DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30 AND activity IN ('Walking', 'Cycling') ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, temperature FROM user_behavior_data WHERE light_intensity < 50 AND activity = 'Resting' ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, behavior_event FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE behavior_event = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT scene_id, scene_name FROM LightingScenes WHERE scene_description LIKE '%bright%';
SELECT user_id, behavior_event, timestamp FROM UserBehaviorData ORDER BY user_id, timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, behavior_event FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT * FROM LightingScenes WHERE scene_name LIKE 'Living%'
SELECT scene_id, scene_description FROM LightingScenes ORDER BY scene_id ASC
SELECT user_id, timestamp, behavior_event FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorData;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehaviorData ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT scene_name, scene_intensity FROM LightingScenes WHERE scene_intensity > 50;
SELECT user_id, preferred_scene_id, preference_timestamp FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences JOIN LightingScenes ON UserPreferences.preferred_scene_id = LightingScenes.scene_id;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorData;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE behavior_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT scene_name, scene_description, scene_intensity FROM LightingScenes WHERE scene_intensity >= 50 ORDER BY scene_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences up JOIN LightingScenes ls ON up.preferred_scene_id = ls.scene_id WHERE up.preference_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ls.scene_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS preference_count FROM UserPreferences GROUP BY user_id HAVING preference_count > 3 ORDER BY preference_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data;
SELECT action_description, action_timestamp FROM user_behavior_data WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT scene_name, brightness FROM lighting_scenes ORDER BY brightness DESC;
SELECT total_actions, productivity_score FROM user_statistics WHERE user_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, preferred_scene_id FROM user_lighting_preferences WHERE preferred_scene_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, action_timestamp, action_description FROM user_behavior_data WHERE action_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT scene_id, scene_name, brightness, color_temperature FROM lighting_scenes WHERE brightness < 50 ORDER BY scene_name DESC
SELECT user_id, preferred_scene_id FROM user_lighting_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT user_id, total_actions, productivity_score FROM user_statistics WHERE productivity_score > 8 ORDER BY total_actions DESC
SELECT user_id, action_timestamp, action_description FROM user_behavior_data JOIN user_statistics ON user_behavior_data.user_id = user_statistics.user_id ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, behavior_date FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_name, activity_type, activity_duration FROM activities WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY email DESC, last_login ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE gender='Female' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC, username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email, gender FROM users WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_login DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type='Positive' AND behavior_date='2022-10-15' ORDER BY behavior_time ASC;
